## Bundle.BundleUtils.parseBundleFromJson() method

Parses bundle data from a JSON string. Convenience method that combines JSON parsing with bundle component extraction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static parseBundleFromJson(jsonString: string): Result<IBundleComponents>;
```

Result&lt;[IBundleComponents](./ts-res.bundle.ibundlecomponents.md)<!-- -->&gt;
